title: Evening Shadows Living Light
description: *Evening Shadows Living Light*, 2025. Digital video, color, sound, 00:20 min, 60 fps. Created using Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Topaz Labs. Hosted on IPFS. Music by Benjamin Simpson. Benjamin Simpson Collection.
songDescription: Atmospheric analog synth composition evoking memory, loss, and the flicker of living light.
musicRights: Original composition by Benjamin Simpson. All rights reserved.

title: Porcelain Ghost
description: Porcelain Ghost evokes the ancient vision of elements unfit to mingle — “iron mixed with miry clay.” Through spectral imagery and fractured sound, the piece contemplates the uneasy fusion of flesh and machine. Where spirit and matter find harmony in living form, the mechanical intrudes as an alien presence, incapable of true union.
medium: Digital video with original sound, color
songDescription: Darkwave cinematic elegy blending pulse-driven analog bass, spectral synths, ghost-textured glitches, and breath-heavy vocals. Evokes fractured time and contrasts: fragile vs. eternal, flesh vs. code, angelic vs. decay.
musicRights: Original composition by Benjamin Simpson. All rights reserved.
license: Visual and audio components © 2025 Benjamin Simpson. All rights reserved.
